p: The T.Â trifidum shrubs were collected from the natural veld in the village of Mbizana, Eastern Cape, South Africa. The plant was authenticated at the Albany Museum Herbarium in Grahamstown, South Africa (voucher specimen number IMAZ08/2018). The collected shrubs were rinsed with distilled water and air-dried for 7 days. Dry shrubs were ground into powder with a blender (Waring Products Division, Torrington, USA).
